overview: Camille lives a beautiful love story with her partner Margot, but Margot's desire to have a child rekindles a deep pain in Camille, who is tormented by a dramatic event from her past that she has never told her partner. A therapist by trade, Camille meets a new client, Nina, a sunny dancer who shares Camille's fears and anxieties. The catharsis allows both women to choose their destinies and their life patterns. Will Camille decide to be honest with Margot? Will Nina find the strength to face her fear of the void?
title: Captive
